text: Ani ke tyo vyakti jasako lagi usako naramro karma akarsaka bana'i'eko cha ra jasala'i usale ramro dekhadaicha? Niscaya nai allaha jasala'i cahancha, margabata vancita rakhdacha ra jasala'i cahancha sojho bato dekha'umcha! Tasartha uniharuko nimti aphasoca gardaâ€“gardai tapa'im prana jokhimama naparnus. Allahale ramrosamga jandacha, je uniharule garirakheka chan
